name: Mobile Market Creator
tag_list: mobile, mobile-marketing, sms, text-message-marketing, mobile-websites, iphone-apps, android-apps, html5-apps, bluetooth-proximity-marketing, bluetooth, intelligent-numbers, vanity-numbers
overview:
Mobile Market Creator is a full service mobile service provider.

With over 5 billion mobile subscriptions there is no doubt that mobile is not only here to stay but is rapidly becoming the communication choice of most people, young or old.

MMC provides a wide range of services including, but not limited to, SMS Text Messaging, Mobile Website Creation and Hosting, iPhone and Android Apps, HTML 5 Apps, Bluetooth Proximity Marketing and are new Intelligent Number System.

Today it is not only affordable but critical for all businesses to reach out to the mobile consumer where they are and with what they need. It is no longer OK to just be on the web but more importantly, it is now critical to be mobile friendly.

MMC understands that it is never the technology that counts but rather the needs of their customers. We are not a one size fits all company and understand that different companies need different services.

What is important in today’s environment is that every company understand that without mobile they are truly not marketing.

If you are not mobile optimized today, the one thing you can be sure of is that your competition is or soon will be.

So….Mobilize It!
